   contain the root `toctree` directive.

PPReCOGG documentation
======================

PPReCOGG is a system for the per-pixel recognition of cancers using oriented 
Gabors on the GPU. 

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   
   how
   install
   examples
   api
